title: Eighteen Years Lost
episode_desc: A man is charged for a crime he didn't commit. All the evidence points to some one else, so why don't the police investigate them? Small town, bad family name? A great miscarriage of justice is just the beginning for Steve Avery.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Turning the Tables
episode_desc: As Steven starts creating a new life for himself, he pursues a lawsuit against Manitowoc County law enforcement officials for corruption in his case.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Plight of the Accused
episode_desc: Steven is back in jail, charged with murder, but there are troubling questions about how he was arrested and why.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Indefensible
episode_desc: An unexpected confession casts doubt on Steven's role in the murder case, but the new suspect gives conflicting accounts of what occurred.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: The Last Person to See Teresa Alive
episode_desc: As Steven's trial begins, his attorneys argue that law enforcement officials framed him and were negligent in not pursuing other leads in the case.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Testing the Evidence
episode_desc: Steven's attorneys cross-examine forensic experts about contaminated evidence and the absence of proof linking Steven to the crime.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Framing Defense
episode_desc: As the murder trial continues, Steven's attorneys present their case that law enforcement officials planted evidence to frame him.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: The Great Burden
episode_desc: After two long days of closing arguments, the jury deliberates. Steven's fate hinges on whether the jury believes police misconduct may have occurred.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Lack of Humility
episode_desc: Steven's trial is over, but a new one is just beginning. Will the jury find the suspect's confession or his conflicting statements more believable?
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Fighting for Their Lives
episode_desc: In the years after Steven and Brendan's very public trials, the various members of the Avery family struggle to mend their broken lives.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Number 18
episode_desc: Powerhouse lawyer Kathleen Zellner offers to take Steven's case; Brendan's postconviction lawyers fight in federal court to try and get him released.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Words and Words Only
episode_desc: Brendan's lawyers work to prove his conviction was based on a coerced confession; Kathleen tests Steven in new ways and visits the alleged crime scene.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: A Legal Miracle
episode_desc: Kathleen's forensic experts review the evidence found in Steven's burn pit; A 1996 statute limits Brendan's chances of success in federal court.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Welcome to Wisconsin
episode_desc: Cautiously optimistic, Steven and his family wait to hear important news about his case; Kathleen files a motion for new scientific testing.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: What + Why = Who
episode_desc: Searching for evidence of tampering, Kathleen visits Steven's trailer; A new twist on Brendan's case sends his family on an emotional rollercoaster.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Everything Takes Time
episode_desc: Kathleen obtains access to some of the original physical evidence from the case; The former prosecutor holds a press conference.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Item FL
episode_desc: Kathleen runs new tests on the bullet believed to have killed Teresa Halbach and tracks Teresa's movements on the day she disappeared.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Special Care
episode_desc: Kathleen uncovers evidence about one of the State's star witnesses; Brendan's case takes another unexpected turn.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Friday Nite
episode_desc: A witness comes forward with new information about Teresa's car; Kathleen attempts to build the timeline of what happened to Teresa on Oct. 31, 2005.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

title: Trust No One
episode_desc: Kathleen makes two of the biggest discoveries of the case; Brendan's lawyers take his case to the next level.
show_desc: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.
